entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Blowing snow near the Richardson mountains. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 01:58 AM MST Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Blowing snow near the Richardson mountains early in the morning. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then becoming light late in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 01:58 AM MST Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 01:58 AM MST Sunday 19 March 2023
